Header: Five Indian fishermen arrested in Sri Lankan waters
Content: Sri Lankan Navy has detained 5 Indian fishermen who crossed the Sri Lankan sea border with their boat. Navy said that the suspects have been engaged in illegal fishing activities in the waters North to Mannar. A speed boat of the Navy has been utilized for the arrest.
